reviewText:
Great to have if you want to understand Balanchine's style and their pointe "philosophy".
Detailed explanation of each pointe step and how to execute it properly aka Balanchine style by Ms Suki Schorer with occasional filler by Ms Merrill Ashley.
I don't think this is an exhaustive list of pointe work but you'll get an idea of their philosophy and musical timing/phrasing.
I'm so glad I bought it!
